query:
SELECT 
    COLUMN_NAME, 
    DATA_TYPE, 
    CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH,
    COLUMN_COMMENT
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 
WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'users' 
  AND COLUMN_NAME = 'passwordHash';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4BVDFYYBjXPHJtC.709074b71e30 --database EvJULGQoHRNqTu98ru5T2m --execute SELECT 
    COLUMN_NAME, 
    DATA_TYPE, 
    CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH,
    COLUMN_COMMENT
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 
WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'users' 
  AND COLUMN_NAME = 'passwordHash';
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH	COLUMN_COMMENT
passwordHash	varchar	72	BCRYPT hash (até 72 caracteres)
